data.name: Synthetic Love
data.detailed_description:
Biochemist Victor is the soon-to-be-famed inventor of the pleasure-enhancing serum that’s going to change the world forever. He’s traveled to his private residence found high in the mountains and away from prying eyes so he can finish his serum in solitude -- though, he’s not exactly alone.

Three lovely female companions accompany Victor to make sure his workspaces stay tidy and that he’s not disturbed while he works. But most importantly, they can help him realize just how much pleasure his serum can provide. That is, as soon as he can figure out why the serum causes complete memory loss during the most pleasurable times. Help Victor overcome these losses in memory so that you too can experience each and every sensual encounter he has with his sexy female companions.

Key Game Features

  • 3 different endings
  • 15+ Explorable Locations
  • 3 Unique Girls
  • Deep Reaching Exploration & Choice System
  • Visual Novel Style Interactions
data.about_the_game:
Biochemist Victor is the soon-to-be-famed inventor of the pleasure-enhancing serum that’s going to change the world forever. He’s traveled to his private residence found high in the mountains and away from prying eyes so he can finish his serum in solitude -- though, he’s not exactly alone.

Three lovely female companions accompany Victor to make sure his workspaces stay tidy and that he’s not disturbed while he works. data.short_description: Biochemist Victor (the inventor of the serum) and three girls go to the isolated private residence high in the mountains. They work, they rest and make experiments there. The serum has an impressive effect – your sex satisfaction becomes incredible. But there's one unpleasant side effect – partial memory loss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 1.8Ghz+ (approx)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated (shared) video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Visual Studio 2012 - 32 bit Runtime
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated (shared) video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Visual Studio 2012 - 32 bit Runtime

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+ (Lion)
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 1.8Ghz+ (approx)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+ (Lion)
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 1.8Ghz+ (approx)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later
  • Processor: Duo Core @ 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

content_descriptors.notes: Synthetic Love includes Nudity, Graphic Sexual Themes, Sexual Acts, male and female characters undressing and wearing lingerie across multiple scenes within the game. As well as male to female relationships.
